<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"在庫調整"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/inventory/adjustments"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



在庫数を調整します（管理者権限が必要）。


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["skuId","quantity","type","reason"],"properties":{"skuId":{"type":"string","description":"SKU ID","example":"SKU-JACKET-M-BLACK"},"quantity":{"type":"integer","description":"調整数量（正または負）","example":10},"type":{"type":"string","enum":["STOCK_IN","STOCK_OUT","CORRECTION","DAMAGED","RETURN"],"description":"調整タイプ","example":"STOCK_IN"},"reason":{"type":"string","description":"調整理由","example":"新規入荷"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
